section.sentence: Three little crows with big straw hats all ______ to the light of the moon.
Their ________ kerfuffled, their feet did shuffle, for the harvest was meant to come soon.
"Woo-hoo! Hooray!" The crows did cry, as their _____ feet did a sashay.
"The harvest is near! And don't you see, dear? We'll dance till the very next day."
There'll be corn, beets, ________, and such. Zucchini, carrots, and also some squash.
A whole ______ spread, with juice and cornbread, I'm sure we'll all feel very posh.
We'll gobble it down, till our bellies are round, our ______ work has come to an end.
Our hard work is done, so let's have some fun! ______ is just 'round the bend.
Three little _____ with big straw hats all danced to the light of the moon.
With smiles and glee and good company, they sang proud their own harvest tune.
